lagom.engine¶

class lagom.engine.BaseEngine(agent, runner, config, logger, **kwargs)[source]¶

Base class for engine: agent training and evaluation process.

All inherited subclasses should at least implement the following functions: 1. train(self) 2. eval(self)

eval(n=None)[source]¶

Agent evaluation process for one iteration.

Parameters:n (int, optional) – n-th iteration for evaluation.
Returns:evluation output
Return type:eval_output (dict)
log_eval(eval_output, **kwargs)[source]¶

Log the information about evaluation.

Internally, a Logger will be created and save all the logged information.

Parameters:
  • eval_output (dict) – dictionary of evaluation output returned from eval()
  • **kwargs – keyword aguments used for logging.
Returns:

logger with evaluation information.
Return type:

eval_logger (Logger)
log_train(train_output, **kwargs)[source]¶

Log the information about the training.

Internally, a Logger will be created and save all the logged information.

Parameters:
  • train_output (dict) – dictionary of training output returned from train()
  • **kwargs – keyword aguments used for logging.
Returns:

logger with training information.
Return type:

train_logger (Logger)
train(n=None)[source]¶

Agent training process for one iteration.

Parameters:n (int, optional) – n-th iteration for training.
Returns:training output
Return type:train_output (dict)
